div.p: Hectic! 9:00 until about 3:00; the young people come in we, you know, just talk generally about what they’ve been doing during that evening
they sit down, do some education, have a break, a bit more education then they have their lunch and then they have alternative time
so they obviously get to do the sports, drama, dance, watching a film, reading a magazine, mentoring that kind of thing.
On the evenings I teach dancing so it’s totally different, obviously the goals and outcomes are different to my job in the daytime so I tend
to do obviously when I go there I’ve got to be in a different frame of mind, I have to be upbeat so the young people take part
because they don’t want a moany teacher...
